title: I recommend: Pen to Printer seminar
content:
If you can make it next year I recommend the Pen to Printer seminar put on in Ditchling ( South of England ) by the Edward Johnston Foundation.

[http://www.ejf.org.uk/pentoprinter2009.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104004030/http:/www.ejf.org.uk/pentoprinter2009.html "http://www.ejf.org.uk/pentoprinter2009.html")

I will post some pictures from it to my flickr soon.
author: ebensorkin
